reportfactory 0.0.5

  • Changelog

Collect and ship compiled markdown reports to a single folder

Source: R/ship_reports.R
ship_reports.Rd

Copies output files for log entries that match given conditions to a dated `shipped_[yyyy-mm-dd]` folder

ship_reports(factory = getwd(), match_exact_type = NULL,
  most_recent = TRUE, outputs_only = FALSE, output_file_types = c(),
  ...)

Arguments

factory

The path the factory directory, defaults to current directory
match_exact_type

a vector of condition types passed to `filter_log` (dots, file, and/or params) that are to be matched EXACTLY to the log entry (no entries with missing components of the specified type will be returned)
most_recent

a logical indicating passed to `filter_log` if only the last log entry should be returned; `FALSE` by default.
outputs_only

a logical indicating if only the outputs of a log entry should be returned passed to `filter_log`; `FALSE` by default.
output_file_types

a vector containing the file types that are to be returned for each entry passed to `filter_log`
...

the arguments that will be used to match and return log entries, which should match the structure of the [compile_reports()] method - passed to `filter_log`

Author

Amy Gimma (amy.gimma@lshtm.ac.uk)

Examples


odir <- getwd()

setwd(tempdir())
random_factory(include_examples = TRUE)

#> [1] "factory_ee10xomb92Q9Q"
source_name <- "foo"
report_source_file_name <- list_reports(pattern = source_name)[1]

dots_args <- list("lots" = data.frame(a = c(10,20)))
compile_report(
  report_source_file_name, 
  quiet = FALSE, 
  params = list("other" = "two",
                "more" = list("thing" = "foo")),
  extra = dots_args)

#> 
#> /// compiling report: 'foo_2018-06-29'
#> // using params: 
#> other: two
#> more: foo
#> 
#> 
#> processing file: foo_2018-06-29.Rmd
#> 
  |                                                                            
  |                                                                      |   0%
  |                                                                            
  |.....                                                                 |   7%
#>   ordinary text without R code
#> 
#> 
  |                                                                            
  |.........                                                             |  13%
#> label: options (with options) 
#> List of 4
#>  $ include: logi FALSE
#>  $ message: logi FALSE
#>  $ warning: logi FALSE
#>  $ error  : logi FALSE
#> 
#> 
  |                                                                            
  |..............                                                        |  20%
#>   ordinary text without R code
#> 
#> 
  |                                                                            
  |...................                                                   |  27%
#> label: iris
#> 
  |                                                                            
  |.......................                                               |  33%
#>   ordinary text without R code
#> 
#> 
  |                                                                            
  |............................                                          |  40%
#> label: boxplots
#> 
  |                                                                            
  |.................................                                     |  47%
#>   ordinary text without R code
#> 
#> 
  |                                                                            
  |.....................................                                 |  53%
#> label: violins
#> 
  |                                                                            
  |..........................................                            |  60%
#>   ordinary text without R code
#> 
#> 
  |                                                                            
  |...............................................                       |  67%
#> label: summary_base
#> 
  |                                                                            
  |...................................................                   |  73%
#>   ordinary text without R code
#> 
#> 
  |                                                                            
  |........................................................              |  80%
#> label: summary_tidy
#> 
  |                                                                            
  |.............................................................         |  87%
#>   ordinary text without R code
#> 
#> 
  |                                                                            
  |.................................................................     |  93%
#> label: outputs
#> 
  |                                                                            
  |......................................................................| 100%
#>   ordinary text without R code
#> 
#> 
#> output file: foo_2018-06-29.knit.md
#> /usr/local/bin/pandoc +RTS -K512m -RTS foo_2018-06-29.utf8.md --to html4 --from markdown+autolink_bare_uris+tex_math_single_backslash --output foo_2018-06-29.html --lua-filter /Users/runner/work/_temp/Library/rmarkdown/rmarkdown/lua/pagebreak.lua --lua-filter /Users/runner/work/_temp/Library/rmarkdown/rmarkdown/lua/latex-div.lua --email-obfuscation none --self-contained --standalone --section-divs --template /Users/runner/work/_temp/Library/rmarkdown/rmd/h/default.html --no-highlight --variable highlightjs=1 --variable 'theme:bootstrap' --include-in-header /var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T//Rtmpo0Idzk/rmarkdown-str8b968bf71fc.html --mathjax --variable 'mathjax-url:https://mathjax.rstudio.com/latest/MathJax.js?config=TeX-AMS-MML_HTMLorMML' 
#> 
#> Output created: foo_2018-06-29.html
#> 
#> /// 'foo_2018-06-29' done!

compile_report(
  report_source_file_name,
  quiet = TRUE,
  params = list(other = "test"))

#> 
#> /// compiling report: 'foo_2018-06-29'
#> // using params: 
#> other: test
#> 
#> /// 'foo_2018-06-29' done!

compile_report(
  report_source_file_name, 
  quiet = FALSE, 
  params = list("other" = "two",
                "more" = list("thing" = "foo")),
  extra = dots_args)

#> 
#> /// compiling report: 'foo_2018-06-29'

#> 
#> Output created: foo_2018-06-29.html
#> 
#> /// 'foo_2018-06-29' done!

log_file <- readRDS(".compile_log.rds")

ship_reports(
  params = list("other" = "two"), 
  most_recent = TRUE
)

#> 
#> /// Shipping foo_2018-06-29 outputs: 
#> 
#> boxplots-1.pdf
#> boxplots-1.png
#> violins-1.pdf
#> violins-1.png
#> foo_2018-06-29.html
#> outputs_base.csv

setwd(odir)
